Within this Agri-environment/BPS (i.e. your money and mine) made up about 2/3 and diversification (B&B, renting buildings etc) the rest. Actual income from agriculture (growing stuff) was slightly less than zero.

text:
Once again, “Cold Fire” protects with a Happy Face.
In reality we have shown how by using “Cold Fire” on wildfires can give back control to firefighters and landowners. 
Reducing large carbon release and particulates. @wildfire_craig @GuillermoRein @EnvAgency @NFCC_FireChiefs https://t.co/b8HCZyAZ9P
